events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and I would like to request a refund because I need the correct product.
The customer's issue has been classified under the Refund cluster due to the request for money back.
An agent was assigned to handle the customer's refund request regarding the incorrect order.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the mistake with your order. I will do my best to help you get this resolved quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number to verify the issue for the refund process?
I have attached the photo of the wrong item and included my order number as requested to proceed with the refund.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and assistance with the refund.
The refund process has been initiated and your case is now marked as resolved. Please let us know if you need further help.
We are following up to confirm that you have received the refund and everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
We are closing this case as the refund was completed successfully and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
A satisfaction survey was sent to the customer to gather feedback on their experience with our refund process.
